title: Handle a Room Noise Complaint
description: A guest calls the front desk at 11 PM to complain about a loud party in the adjacent room.

tasks.description: Apologize to the guest and confirm their room number and the location of the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary details and shows empathy.

tasks.description: Dispatch security personnel to the location of the party to address the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a security officer to the correct room.

tasks.description: Offer the complaining guest a room change or a service recovery gesture (e.g., complimentary breakfast).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proactively offers a solution to make up for the inconvenience.
